  let sf_S := SupportFun S
  (s ‚àà closure (convexHull ‚Ñù S)) ‚Üî
  (‚àÄ (d : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)), inner ‚Ñù s d ‚â§ sf_S d) := by
  sorry

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section C, Proposition 2.2.3 -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_C_2_2_3 {n : ‚Ñï}
  (S : Set (EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)))
  (s : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n))
  (hS : Set.Nonempty S) :
  let œÉS := SupportFun S
  ((s ‚àà affineHull S) ‚Üî (‚àÄ d, œÉS d + œÉS (-1 ‚Ä¢ d) = 0 ‚Üí inner ‚Ñù s d = œÉS d)) ‚àß
  ((s ‚àà intrinsicInterior ‚Ñù S) ‚Üî (‚àÄ d, œÉS d + œÉS (-1 ‚Ä¢ d) > 0 ‚Üí inner ‚Ñù s d < œÉS d)) ‚àß
  ((s ‚àà interior S) ‚Üî (‚àÄ d, d ‚â† 0 ‚Üí inner ‚Ñù s d < œÉS d)):= by
  sorry

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section C, Proposition 2.2.4 -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_C_2_2_4 {n : ‚Ñï}
  (S : Set (EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)))

  (hS_closed : IsClosed S)
  (hS_convex : Convex ‚Ñù S) :
  let œÉS := SupportFun S

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section C, Proposition 3.1.1 -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_C_3_1_1 {n : ‚Ñï}
  (œÉ : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí WithTop ‚Ñù)

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section C, Proposition 3.1.2 -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_C_3_1_2 {n : ‚Ñï}
  (S : Set (EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)))
  (œÉ : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí WithTop ‚Ñù)
  (hS_nonempty : Set.Nonempty S) (hS_closed : IsClosed S) (hS_convex : Convex ‚Ñù S)
  (hœÉ_closed : IsClosedFun œÉ) (hœÉ_sublinear : IsSublinear (liftWithToptoEReal œÉ)) :
  let support_fun := SupportFun S

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section C, Proposition 3.1.4 -/

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section C, Proposition 3.2.4 -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_C_3_2_4 {n : ‚Ñï}
  (C : Set (EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)))

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section C, Proposition 3.2.5 -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_C_3_2_5 {n : ‚Ñï}

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section C, Proposition 3.2.7 -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_C_3_2_7 {n : ‚Ñï}
  (C : Set (EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)))
  (d s : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n))
  (hC_nonempty : Set.Nonempty C)
  (hC_compact : IsCompact C)
  (hC_convex : Convex ‚Ñù C)
  (hC_origin : 0 ‚àà interior C) :
  let C' := {s | ‚àÄ v ‚àà C, inner ‚Ñù s v ‚â§ 1}
  let Hs := {y | inner ‚Ñù s y = 1}
  let Hd := {y | inner ‚Ñù d y = 1}
  List.TFAE [
    ‚àÉ (s' : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)) (t' : ‚Ñù), (SupportingHyperplaneAt s' d t' C) ‚àß (AffineHyperplane s' t' = Hs),
    ‚àÉ (d' : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)) (t' : ‚Ñù), (SupportingHyperplaneAt d' s t' C) ‚àß (AffineHyperplane d' t' = Hd),
    (d ‚àà frontier C) ‚àß (s ‚àà frontier C') ‚àß (inner ‚Ñù s d = 1),
    (d ‚àà C) ‚àß (s ‚àà C') ‚àß (inner ‚Ñù s d = 1)
  ] := by
  sorry

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section C, Proposition 3.3.1 -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_C_3_3_1 {n : ‚Ñï}

  (hS_convex : Convex ‚Ñù S‚ÇÅ ‚àß Convex ‚Ñù S‚ÇÇ) :

  let œÉ‚ÇÇ := SupportFun S‚ÇÇ
  S‚ÇÅ ‚äÜ S‚ÇÇ ‚Üî ‚àÄ d, œÉ‚ÇÅ d ‚â§ œÉ‚ÇÇ d := by

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section C, Proposition 3.3.2 (i) -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_C_3_3_2_i {n : ‚Ñï}
  (S‚ÇÅ S‚ÇÇ : Set (EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)))
  (t‚ÇÅ t‚ÇÇ : ‚Ñù)
  (hS_nonempty : Set.Nonempty S‚ÇÅ ‚àß Set.Nonempty S‚ÇÇ)
  (hS_closed : IsClosed S‚ÇÅ ‚àß IsClosed S‚ÇÇ)
  (hS_convex : Convex ‚Ñù S‚ÇÅ ‚àß Convex ‚Ñù S‚ÇÇ)
  (ht : t‚ÇÅ > 0 ‚àß t‚ÇÇ > 0):
  let œÉ‚ÇÅ := SupportFun S‚ÇÅ
  let œÉ‚ÇÇ := SupportFun S‚ÇÇ
  let S‚ÇÅ' := {x | ‚àÉ s ‚àà S‚ÇÅ, x = t‚ÇÅ ‚Ä¢ s}
  let S‚ÇÇ' := {x | ‚àÉ s ‚àà S‚ÇÇ, x = t‚ÇÇ ‚Ä¢ s}
  let S := closure {x | ‚àÉ s‚ÇÅ ‚àà S‚ÇÅ', ‚àÉ s‚ÇÇ ‚àà S‚ÇÇ', x = s‚ÇÅ + s‚ÇÇ}
  ‚àÄ x, (t‚ÇÅ ‚Ä¢ (œÉ‚ÇÅ x) + t‚ÇÇ ‚Ä¢ (œÉ‚ÇÇ x)) = SupportFun S x := by
  sorry

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section C, Proposition 3.3.2 (ii) -/
/- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section C, Proposition 3.3.2 (iii) -/
/- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section C, Proposition 3.3.3 -/
/- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section C, Proposition 3.3.4 -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_C_3_3_4 {m n : ‚Ñï}
  (A : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin m) ‚Üí‚Çó[‚Ñù] EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n))
  (s : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin m) ‚Üí EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin m) ‚Üí ‚Ñù)
  (S : Set (EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin m)))
  (hs : IsScalarProduct s)
  (hS_nonempty : Set.Nonempty S) (hS_closed : IsClosed S) (hS_convex : Convex ‚Ñù S) :
  let A_star := A.adjoint
  let œÉ := SupportFun S
  let A_inv := fun d => {p : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin m) | A p = d}
  let A_adj_inv_S := {p : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) | ‚àÉ d ‚àà S, A_star p = d}
  let œÉ_adj_inv := SupportFun A_adj_inv_S
  (‚àÄ (d : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)), IsMinorizedOn œÉ (A_inv d)) ‚Üí
  (‚àÄ (x : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)), œÉ_adj_inv x = lscHull (fun v => ImageFunction A œÉ v) x) := by
  sorry

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section D, Proposition 1.1.2 -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_D_1_1_2 {n : ‚Ñï}
  (f : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí ‚Ñù)

  sorry

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section D, Proposition 1.1.6 -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_D_1_1_6 {n : ‚Ñï}
  (f : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí ‚Ñù)
  (x : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n))
  (hf : ConvexOn ‚Ñù Set.univ f) :
  let œÉ := fun (d : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)) => directionalDeriv (liftRealtoEReal f) x d
  let œÉ' := fun (d : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)) => directionalDeriv œÉ 0 d
  (‚àÄ (Œ¥ : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)), œÉ' Œ¥ = œÉ Œ¥) ‚àß
  (‚àÄ (Œ¥ : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)), (œÉ Œ¥ = œÉ 0 + œÉ' Œ¥) ‚àß (œÉ Œ¥ = œÉ' Œ¥)) ‚àß
  (SubdifferentialI œÉ 0 = SubdifferentialI (liftRealtoEReal f) x) := by

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section D, Proposition 1.2.2 -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_D_1_2_2 {n : ‚Ñï}

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section D, Proposition 1.3.1 -/
/- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section D, Lemma 1.3.2 -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_D_1_3_2 {n : ‚Ñï}

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section D, Lemma 1.3.3 -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_D_1_3_3 {n : ‚Ñï}
  (g : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí ‚Ñù)

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section D, Theorem 1.3.4 -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_D_1_3_4 {n : ‚Ñï}
  (f : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí ‚Ñù)
  (x : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n))
  (hf_convex : ConvexOn ‚Ñù Set.univ f)
  (hf_subdiff : Set.Nonempty (SubdifferentialI (liftRealtoEReal f) x)) :
  let S := sublevelSetFun (liftRealtoEReal f) x
  (tangentConeAt ‚Ñù S x = {d | directionalDeriv (liftRealtoEReal f) x d ‚â§ 0}) ‚àß
  (interior (tangentConeAt ‚Ñù S x) = {d | directionalDeriv (liftRealtoEReal f) x d < 0}) ‚àß
  Set.Nonempty (interior (tangentConeAt ‚Ñù S x)):= by

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section D, Theorem 1.3.5 -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_D_1_3_5 {n : ‚Ñï}

  (t ‚â• 0) ‚àß (s ‚àà SubdifferentialI (liftRealtoEReal f) x) ‚àß (d = t ‚Ä¢ s)) := by

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section D, Lemma 2.1.1 -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_D_2_1_1 {n : ‚Ñï}
  (f : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí ‚Ñù)
  (x : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n))
  (hf_convex : ConvexOn ‚Ñù Set.univ f) :
  let f'_ereal := fun (d : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)) => directionalDeriv (liftRealtoEReal f) x d
  let f'_real := fun (d : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)) => realDirectionalDeriv f x d
  (‚àÄ x, f'_ereal x = f'_real x) ‚àß
  (‚àÄ (Œµ : ‚Ñù), (Œµ > 0) ‚Üí ‚àÉ Œ¥ > 0,
  ‚àÄ (h : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)), ‚Äñh‚Äñ ‚â§ Œ¥ ‚Üí
  abs (f (x + h) - f x - realDirectionalDeriv f x h) ‚â§ Œµ ‚Ä¢ ‚Äñh‚Äñ) := by
  sorry

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section D, Lemma 2.1.3 -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_D_2_1_3 {n : ‚Ñï}
  (f : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí ‚Ñù)
  (s h : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n))
  (hf_convex : ConvexOn ‚Ñù Set.univ f) :
  (‚àÄ (x : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)), (h ‚àà normalConeAt (SubdifferentialI (liftRealtoEReal f) x) s) ‚Üí
  Asymptotics.IsLittleO (ùìù 0) (fun h => f (x + h) - f x - inner ‚Ñù s h) (fun h => ‚Äñh‚Äñ)) ‚àß
  (‚àÄ (x : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)), (s ‚àà ExposedFace (SubdifferentialI (liftRealtoEReal f) x) h) ‚Üí
  Asymptotics.IsLittleO (ùìù 0) (fun h => f (x + h) - f x - inner ‚Ñù s h) (fun h => ‚Äñh‚Äñ)) := by
  sorry

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section D, Lemma 2.1.5  -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_D_2_1_5 {n : ‚Ñï}
  (f : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí ‚Ñù)
  (x d : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n))
  (hf_convex : ConvexOn ‚Ñù Set.univ f) :
  let f' := fun (d : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)) => directionalDeriv (liftRealtoEReal f) x d
  SubdifferentialI f' d = ExposedFace (SubdifferentialI (liftRealtoEReal f) x) d := by

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section D, Lemma 2.2.1  -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_D_2_2_1 {n : ‚Ñï}
  (f : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí ‚Ñù)
  (x : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n))
  (hf_convex : ConvexOn ‚Ñù Set.univ f) :
  List.TFAE [
    ‚àÄ (y : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)), f y ‚â• f x,
    0 ‚àà SubdifferentialI (liftRealtoEReal f) x,
    ‚àÄ (d : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)), directionalDeriv (liftRealtoEReal f) x d ‚â• 0
  ] := by
  sorry

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section D, Lemma 2.3.1  -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_D_2_3_1 {n : ‚Ñï}
  (f : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí ‚Ñù)
  (x y : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)) (t : ‚Ñù)
  (hf_convex : ConvexOn ‚Ñù Set.univ f) (ht : 0 ‚â§ t ‚àß t ‚â§ 1):
  let xt := t ‚Ä¢ y + (1 - t) ‚Ä¢ x
  let phi := fun (v : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin 1)) => f xt
  let t_asvec := fun _ => t
  -- work in ‚Ñù, rather than EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)
  let subdiff := {v : ‚Ñù | ‚àÉ v' ‚àà SubdifferentialI (liftRealtoEReal phi) t_asvec, v' 0 = v}
  subdiff = {z : ‚Ñù | ‚àÉ s ‚àà (SubdifferentialI (liftRealtoEReal f) xt), z = inner ‚Ñù s (y - x)} := by
  sorry

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section D, Theorem 2.3.3  -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_D_2_3_3 {n : ‚Ñï}
  (f : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí ‚Ñù)
  (x y : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n))
  (hf_convex : ConvexOn ‚Ñù Set.univ f) (hxy : x ‚â† y) :
  ‚àÉ t ‚àà Set.Ioo 0 1, ‚àÉ s ‚àà SubdifferentialI (liftRealtoEReal f) (t ‚Ä¢ y + (1 - t) ‚Ä¢ x),
  f y - f x = inner ‚Ñù s (y - x) := by
  sorry

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section D, Theorem 4.1.1  -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_D_4_1_1 {n : ‚Ñï}
  (f‚ÇÅ f‚ÇÇ : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí ‚Ñù)
  (t‚ÇÅ t‚ÇÇ : ‚Ñù)
  (hf_convex : ConvexOn ‚Ñù Set.univ f‚ÇÅ ‚àß ConvexOn ‚Ñù Set.univ f‚ÇÇ)
  (ht : t‚ÇÅ > 0 ‚àß t‚ÇÇ > 0) :
  ‚àÄ (x : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)),
  SubdifferentialI (fun x => t‚ÇÅ ‚Ä¢ (f‚ÇÅ x) + t‚ÇÇ ‚Ä¢ (f‚ÇÇ x)) x =
  {v | ‚àÉ v‚ÇÅ ‚àà (SubdifferentialI (liftRealtoEReal f‚ÇÅ) x), ‚àÉ v‚ÇÇ ‚àà (SubdifferentialI (liftRealtoEReal f‚ÇÇ) x),
       v = t‚ÇÅ ‚Ä¢ v‚ÇÅ + t‚ÇÇ ‚Ä¢ v‚ÇÇ} := by
  sorry

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section D, Theorem 4.2.1  -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_D_4_2_1 {n m : ‚Ñï}
  (g : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin m) ‚Üí ‚Ñù)
  (A‚ÇÄ : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí‚Çó[‚Ñù] EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin m))
  (b : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin m))
  (hf_convex : ConvexOn ‚Ñù Set.univ g) :
  ‚àÄ (x : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)),
  (SubdifferentialI (fun v => g (A‚ÇÄ v + b)) x) = Set.image A‚ÇÄ.adjoint (SubdifferentialI (liftRealtoEReal g) (A‚ÇÄ x + b)) := by
  sorry

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section D, Theorem 4.3.1  -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_D_4_3_1 {n m : ‚Ñï}
  (f : ‚Ñï ‚Üí (EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí ‚Ñù))
  (g : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin m) ‚Üí ‚Ñù)
  (hf_convex : ‚àÄ i ‚àà Finset.range m, ConvexOn ‚Ñù Set.univ (f i))
  (hg_convex : ConvexOn ‚Ñù Set.univ g)
  (hg_increasing : ‚àÄ y z, (‚àÄ i, y i ‚â• z i) ‚Üí g y ‚â• g z) :
  let F : (EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)) ‚Üí EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin m) :=
          fun x => (fun i => (f i) x)
  ‚àÄ (x : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)),
  SubdifferentialI (liftRealtoEReal (g ‚àò F)) x =
  {v | ‚àÉ œÅ ‚àà SubdifferentialI (liftRealtoEReal g) (F x), ‚àÉ (s : ‚Ñï ‚Üí EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)),
       (‚àÄ i ‚àà Finset.range m, s i ‚àà SubdifferentialI (liftRealtoEReal (f i)) x) ‚àß
       (v = ‚àë i : Fin m, (œÅ i) ‚Ä¢ (s i))} := by
  sorry

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section D, Corollary 4.3.2  -/
/- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section D, Lemma 4.4.1  -/
/- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section D, Theorem 4.4.2  -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_D_4_4_2 {n : ‚Ñï} {J : Type*} [TopologicalSpace J] [CompactSpace J]
  (f : J ‚Üí (EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí ‚Ñù))
  (x : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n))
  (hf_convex : ‚àÄ (i : J), ConvexOn ‚Ñù Set.univ (f i))
  (hf_finite : ‚àÄ z, ‚®Ü (j : J), (f j z : WithTop ‚Ñù) < ‚ä§)
  (hf_usc : ‚àÄ (j : J), ‚àÄ z, lscAt (fun v => -1 ‚Ä¢ f j v) z) :
  let F : (EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)) ‚Üí EReal := fun z => ‚®Ü (j : J), (f j z)
  let Jx := {j | f j x = F x}
  convexHull ‚Ñù (‚ãÉ j ‚àà Jx, SubdifferentialI (liftRealtoEReal (f j)) x) =
  SubdifferentialI F x := by
  sorry

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section D, Corollary 4.4.4  -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_D_4_4_4 {n : ‚Ñï} {J : Type*} [TopologicalSpace J] [CompactSpace J]
  (f : J ‚Üí (EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí ‚Ñù))
  (x : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n))
  (hf_convex : ‚àÄ (i : J), ConvexOn ‚Ñù Set.univ (f i))
  (hf_finite : ‚àÄ z, ‚®Ü (j : J), (f j z : WithTop ‚Ñù) < ‚ä§)
  (hf_usc : ‚àÄ (j : J), ‚àÄ z, lscAt (fun v => -1 ‚Ä¢ f j v) z)
  (hf_differentiable : ‚àÄ (j : J), Differentiable ‚Ñù (f j)) :
  let F : (EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)) ‚Üí EReal := fun z => ‚®Ü (j : J), (f j z)
  let Jx := {j | f j x = F x}
  SubdifferentialI F x = convexHull ‚Ñù (‚ãÉ j ‚àà Jx, {gradient (f j) x}) := by
  sorry

content:
lemma FCA_chap_D_4_4_5 {n p : ‚Ñï}
  (Y : Set (EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin p)))
  (g : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin p) ‚Üí ‚Ñù)
  (x‚ÇÄ : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n))
  (hf_usc : ‚àÄ x, ‚àÄ y, lscAt (fun v => -1 ‚Ä¢ (g x v)) y)
  (hf_convex : ‚àÄ y ‚àà Y, ConvexOn ‚Ñù Set.univ (fun x => g x y))
  (hf_differentiable : ‚àÄ y ‚àà Y, Differentiable ‚Ñù (fun x => g x y))
  (hf_finite : ‚àÄ x, ‚®Ü y ‚àà Y, (g x y : WithTop ‚Ñù) < ‚ä§) :
  let F : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí EReal := fun x => ‚®Ü y ‚àà Y, (g x y : EReal)
  ‚àÉ (F_finite : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí ‚Ñù),
  ‚àÉ! (y‚ÇÄ : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin p)),
  (‚àÄ x, F_finite x = F x) ‚àß
  (y‚ÇÄ ‚àà Y) ‚àß
  (IsMaxOn (fun y => g x‚ÇÄ y) Y y‚ÇÄ) ‚Üí
  (Differentiable ‚Ñù F_finite) ‚àß
  (gradient F_finite x‚ÇÄ = gradient (fun x => g x y‚ÇÄ) x‚ÇÄ) := by
  sorry

content:
lemma FCA_chap_D_4_5_1 {m n : ‚Ñï}
  (g : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin m) ‚Üí ‚Ñù)
  (A : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin m) ‚Üí‚Çó[‚Ñù] EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n))
  (x : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n))
  (hg_convex : ConvexOn ‚Ñù Set.univ g)
  (hA_surjective : Function.Surjective A) :
  let Ag := fun x => sInf (Set.image g {y | A y = x})
  let Yx := {y | (A y = x) ‚àß (g y = Ag x)}
  (Set.Nonempty Yx) ‚Üí ‚àÄ y ‚àà Yx,
  (SubdifferentialI (liftRealtoEReal Ag) x =
  {s | A.adjoint s ‚àà SubdifferentialI (liftRealtoEReal g) y}) ‚àß
  (SubdifferentialI (liftRealtoEReal Ag) x =
  Set.preimage A.adjoint (SubdifferentialI (liftRealtoEReal g) y)) := by
  sorry

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section D, Corollary 4.5.2  -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_D_4_5_2 {m n : ‚Ñï}
  (g : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin m) ‚Üí ‚Ñù)
  (A : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin m) ‚Üí‚Çó[‚Ñù] EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n))
  (x : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n))
  (hg_convex : ConvexOn ‚Ñù Set.univ g)
  (hA_surjective : Function.Surjective A) :
  let Ag := fun x => sInf (Set.image g {y | A y = x})
  let Yx := {y | (A y = x) ‚àß (g y = Ag x)}
  (Set.Nonempty Yx) ‚Üí (‚àÉ y ‚àà Yx, DifferentiableAt ‚Ñù g y) ‚Üí
  (DifferentiableAt ‚Ñù Ag x) := by

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section D, Corollary 4.5.5  -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_D_4_5_5 {n : ‚Ñï}
  (f‚ÇÅ f‚ÇÇ : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí ‚Ñù)
  (y‚ÇÅ y‚ÇÇ : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n))
  (hf_convex : ConvexOn ‚Ñù Set.univ f‚ÇÅ ‚àß ConvexOn ‚Ñù Set.univ f‚ÇÇ)
  (hf_minorized : ‚àÉ (s : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)) (b : ‚Ñù),
                 ‚àÄ x, (inner ‚Ñù s x + b ‚â§ f‚ÇÅ x) ‚àß (inner ‚Ñù s x + b ‚â§ f‚ÇÇ x)) :
  let infconv := infimalConv (liftRealtoWT f‚ÇÅ) (liftRealtoWT f‚ÇÇ)
  (infconv (y‚ÇÅ + y‚ÇÇ) = f‚ÇÅ y‚ÇÅ + f‚ÇÇ y‚ÇÇ) ‚Üí
  SubdifferentialI infconv (y‚ÇÅ + y‚ÇÇ) =
  (SubdifferentialI (liftRealtoEReal f‚ÇÅ) y‚ÇÅ) ‚à© (SubdifferentialI (liftRealtoEReal f‚ÇÇ) y‚ÇÇ) := by
  sorry

content:
lemma FCA_chap_D_6_1_2 {n : ‚Ñï}
  (f : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí ‚Ñù)
  (C : Set (EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)))
  (c : ‚Ñù)
  (hC_convex : Convex ‚Ñù C) (hc : c > 0) :
  StrongConvexOn C c f ‚Üî
  ‚àÄ x‚ÇÅ ‚àà C, ‚àÄ x‚ÇÇ ‚àà C, ‚àÄ s ‚àà SubdifferentialI (liftRealtoEReal f) x‚ÇÅ,
  f x‚ÇÇ ‚â• f x‚ÇÅ + inner ‚Ñù s (x‚ÇÇ - x‚ÇÅ) + (c / 2) * ‚Äñx‚ÇÇ - x‚ÇÅ‚Äñ^2 := by

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section E, Example 1.2.1 -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_E_1_2_1 {n : ‚Ñï}
  (f : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí WithTop ‚Ñù)
  (hf_nondegenerate : IsNondegenerate f) :
  let f_conj := fun s => Conjugate f s
  let f_epi_supportfun := fun (s : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)) (u : ‚Ñù) =>
  SupportFun {z | (vecHead z, vecLast z) ‚àà (epigraph (liftWithToptoEReal f))} (Fin.snoc s (-u))
  let f_dom_supportfun := fun s => SupportFun {z | z ‚àà effDom (liftWithToptoEReal f)} s
  (Conjugate f =
  fun s => sSup {z : WithTop ‚Ñù | ‚àÉ (x : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)) (r : ‚Ñù),
  (z = (inner ‚Ñù s x) - r) ‚àß ((x, r) ‚àà epigraph (liftWithToptoEReal f))}) ‚àß
  f_epi_supportfun = (fun s u =>
    if u > 0 then u ‚Ä¢ f_conj (u‚Åª¬π ‚Ä¢ s)
    else if u = 0 then f_dom_supportfun s
    else ‚ä§
  ) := by
  sorry

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section E, Proposition 1.2.2 -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_E_1_2_2 {n : ‚Ñï}
  (f : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí WithTop ‚Ñù) (x‚ÇÄ : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n))
  (hf_nondegenerate : IsNondegenerate f) (hf_closed_convex : InClosedConvRn f)
  (hx‚ÇÄ : f x‚ÇÄ ‚â† ‚ä§) :
  let f_conj := fun s => Conjugate f s
  let f_epi_supportfun := fun (s : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)) (u : ‚Ñù) =>
                               SupportFun {z | (vecHead z, vecLast z) ‚àà (epigraph (liftWithToptoEReal f))} (Fin.snoc s (-u))
  let f_dom_supportfun := fun s => SupportFun {z | z ‚àà effDom (liftWithToptoEReal f)} s
  let f_conj_asympfun := fun s => AsymptoticFun f_conj x‚ÇÄ s
  ‚àÄ s, (f_epi_supportfun s 0 = f_dom_supportfun s) ‚àß (f_dom_supportfun s = f_conj_asympfun s) := by
  sorry

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section E, Proposition 1.3.1.i -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_E_1_3_1_i {n : ‚Ñï}

  let g := fun x => f x + r

content:

/- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section E, Proposition 1.3.1.vi -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_E_1_3_1_vi {n : ‚Ñï}
  (f : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí WithTop ‚Ñù) (s‚ÇÄ : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n))

  (f‚ÇÅ : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí WithTop ‚Ñù) (f‚ÇÇ : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí WithTop ‚Ñù) (Œ± : ‚Ñù)
  (hf_nondegenerate : IsNondegenerate f‚ÇÅ ‚àß IsNondegenerate f‚ÇÇ) :

  Œ± ‚àà Set.Ioo 0 1 ‚Üí

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section E, Proposition 1.3.2 -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_E_1_3_2 {n : ‚Ñï}
  (f : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí WithTop ‚Ñù) (H : Subspace ‚Ñù (EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)))

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section E, Proposition 1.3.4 -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_E_1_3_4 {n : ‚Ñï}
  (f : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí WithTop ‚Ñù) (V : Subspace ‚Ñù (EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)))
  (hf_nondegenerate : IsNondegenerate f) (hV_contains_affdom : affineSpan ‚Ñù (effDom (liftWithToptoEReal f)))
  : let U := V·óÆ
    let pV : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) := fun x => Submodule.orthogonalProjection V x
    let pU : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) := fun x => Submodule.orthogonalProjection U x
    ‚àÄ z ‚àà affineSpan ‚Ñù (effDom (liftWithToptoEReal f)), ‚àÄ s,
    Conjugate f s = inner ‚Ñù (pU s) z + Conjugate f (pV s)
  := by sorry

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section E, Theorem 1.3.5 -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_E_1_3_5 {n : ‚Ñï}
  (f : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí WithTop ‚Ñù) (hf_nondegenerate : IsNondegenerate f)
  : epigraph (liftWithToptoEReal (Biconjugate f)) = closure (convexHull ‚Ñù (epigraph (liftWithToptoEReal f)))
  := by sorry

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section E, Theorem 1.3.6 -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_E_1_3_6 {n : ‚Ñï}
  (f : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí WithTop ‚Ñù)
  (g : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí WithTop ‚Ñù) :
  ((Minorizes (Biconjugate f) g) ‚àß (Minorizes g f) ‚Üí ‚àÄ s, Conjugate g s = Conjugate f s) ‚àß
  ((Biconjugate f = f) ‚Üî (InClosedConvRn f)) := by
  sorry

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section E, Proposition 1.3.8 -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_E_1_3_8 {n : ‚Ñï}
  (f : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí WithTop ‚Ñù)
  (hf_nondegenerate : IsNondegenerate f) (hf_coercive : IsOneCoerciveFun f)
  : ‚àÄ s, Conjugate f s < ‚ä§
  := by sorry

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section E, Proposition 1.3.9 -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_E_1_3_9 {n : ‚Ñï}
  (f : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí WithTop ‚Ñù) (x‚ÇÄ : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n))
  (hf_nondegenerate : IsNondegenerate f) :
  (x‚ÇÄ ‚àà interior (effDom (liftWithToptoEReal f)) ‚Üí IsZeroCoerciveFun (fun x => Conjugate f x - inner ‚Ñù x‚ÇÄ x)) ‚àß
  (‚àÄ x, f x ‚â† ‚ä§ ‚Üí IsOneCoerciveFun (Conjugate f))
  := by sorry

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section E, Theorem 1.4.1 -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_E_1_4_1 {n : ‚Ñï}
  (f : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí WithTop ‚Ñù) (x s : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n))
  (hf_nondegenerate : IsNondegenerate f)
  : s ‚àà SubdifferentialAt f x ‚Üî (Conjugate f s) + f x - (inner ‚Ñù s x) = 0
  := by sorry

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section E, Theorem 1.4.2 -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_E_1_4_2 {n : ‚Ñï}
  (f : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí WithTop ‚Ñù) (x : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n))
  (hf_convex : InConvRn f)
  : x ‚àà intrinsicInterior ‚Ñù (effDom (liftWithToptoEReal f)) ‚Üí Set.Nonempty (SubdifferentialAt f x)
  := by sorry

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section E, Theorem 1.4.3 -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_E_1_4_3 {n : ‚Ñï}
  (f : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí WithTop ‚Ñù)
  (g : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí WithTop ‚Ñù)
  (x s : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n))
  (hf_nondegenerate : IsNondegenerate f) :
  (Set.Nonempty (SubdifferentialAt f x) ‚Üí Biconjugate f x = f x) ‚àß
  ((Minorizes (Biconjugate f) g) ‚àß (Minorizes g f) ‚àß (g x = f x) ‚Üí
  (SubdifferentialAt g x) = (SubdifferentialAt f x)) ‚àß
  (s ‚àà SubdifferentialAt f x ‚Üí x ‚àà SubdifferentialAt (Conjugate f) s) := by
  sorry

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section E, Corollary 1.4.4 -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_E_1_4_4 {n : ‚Ñï}
  (f : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n) ‚Üí WithTop ‚Ñù) (x s : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n))
  (hf_closed_convex : InClosedConvRn f)
  : List.TFAE [
    f x + Conjugate f s - inner ‚Ñù s x = 0,
    s ‚àà SubdifferentialAt f x,
    x ‚àà SubdifferentialAt (Conjugate f) s
  ]
  := by sorry

comment: /- Hiriart-Urruty Lemarechal (Fundamentals of Convex analysis), Section E, Corollary 2.1.1 -/
content:
lemma FCA_chap_E_2_1_1 {m n : ‚Ñï}
  (g : EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin m) ‚Üí WithTop ‚Ñù)
  (A : (EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin m)) ‚Üí‚Çó[‚Ñù] (EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)))
  (hg_nondegenerate : IsNondegenerate g)
  (h_nonempty_domain : Set.Nonempty ((Im A.adjoint) ‚à© effDom (liftWithToptoEReal (Conjugate g))))
  : let h := fun x => sInf (Set.image g {y | A y = x})
    ‚àÄ s, Conjugate h s = Conjugate g (A.adjoint s)
  := by sorry
